content: आसुर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [असुरस्येदं अण् <ab>opp.</ab> दैव] {@--1@} Belonging to {%Asuras%}. {@--2@} Belonging to evil spirits; आसुरी माया, आसुरी रात्रिः &c. {@--3@} Infernal, demoniacal; आसुरं भावमाश्रितः <ls>Bg. 7. 15</ls> (for a full exposition of what constitutes आसुर conduct, see <ls>Bg. 16. 7-24</ls>). {@--4@} Not performing sacrifices. {@--5@} Divine, spiritual. --रः {@--1@} A demon [स्वार्थे अण्]. {@--2@} One of the eight forms of marriage, in which the bridegroom purchases the bride from her father or other paternal kinsmen; (see उद्वाह); आसुरो द्रविणादानात् <ls>Y. 1. 61</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 31.</ls> {@--3@} (<ab>pl.</ab>) The stars of the southern hemisphere. {@--4@} A prince of the warrior-tribe Asura. --री {@--1@} Surgery, curing by cutting by instruments. {@--2@} A female demon, demoness; संभ्रमादासुरीभिः <ls>Ve. 1. 3.</ls> {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant Sinapis Ramosa Roxb. (<ab>Mar.</ab> मोहरी; रुई). --रं {@--1@} Blood. {@--2@} Black salt.
